  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4485</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Approach to Revison in the Exam Year (HL/OL)</string>
            <string language="es">Metodología para revisar el examen anual del nivel superior y ordinario (HL/OL, higher level/ordinay level)</string>
            <string language="ga">Cur chuige don dul siar i mBliain an Scrúdaithe (AL/GL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Annäherung an Revison im Prüfung-Jahr (HL/OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Approche à Revison par année d'examen (HL/OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aproximação a Revison no ano do exam (HL/OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metodo a Revison durante l'anno del exam (HL/OL)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσέγγιση σε Revison στο έτος διαγωνισμών 
(HL/$l*OL)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Overview of the Business syllabus with some suggestions for approaches to revising the content and preparing for the LC exam using basic revision tasks.</string>
            <string language="es">Visión general del programa de estudios de Empresariales, con algunas sugerencias sobre las metodologías de revisión del contenido y preparación del examen del Certificado Leaving (LC, Certificate Leaving) donde se utilizan tareas de revisión básicas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbhreathnú ar an siollabas Gnó le roinnt moltaí do chur chuige don dul siar ar an ábhar agus réiteach don Ardteist ag úsáid tascanna dul siar bunúsacaha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überblick über den Geschäft Syllabus mit 
einigen Vorschlägen für Annäherungen an das Verbessern des Inhalts 
und das Vorbereiten für die LC Prüfung mit grundlegenden 
Änderungaufgaben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vue d'ensemble du programme d'affaires avec 
quelques suggestions pour des approches à mettre à jour le contenu 
et à la préparation à l'examen de LC utilisant la révision de base
charge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vista geral do syllabus do negócio com algumas 
sugestões para aproximações a revisar o índice e a preparar-se 
para o exam do LC usando tarefas básicas da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione del programma di affari con alcuni 
suggerimenti per i metodi al modificazione del soddisfare ed alla 
preparazione per il exam di LC usando le mansioni di base di 
revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισκόπηση της επιχειρησιακής διδακτέας ύλης με 
μερικές προτάσεις για τις προσεγγίσεις στην επιθεώρηση του 
περιεχομένου και να προετοιμαστεί για το διαγωνισμό LC που 
χρησιμοποιεί τις βασικές στοιχειώδεις εργασίες αναθεώρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
